title: Fly hard, fly fast, drop nukes in this accessible near-future flight combat sim
description: Nuclear Option rides the line between arcade combat and flight sim in a very good way.

title: Why the original, 1999 version of EverQuest is still one of the best MMOs to play today
description: An assortment of servers run by passionate fans makes it all possible.

title: Cyberpunk 2077's 2.0 overhaul was inspired by the 'old school design' of Diablo 2's skill trees and Doom's 'relentless' combat
description: Cyberpunk's gameplay design lead tells us how the team went about redesigning the perk system.

title: Wordle today: Hint and answer #861 for Saturday, October 28
description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for Saturday's puzzle.

title: South Park makes Baldur's Gate 3 joke, Larian quickly corrects it
description: A South Park gag about Baldur's Gate 3 cross-saves earns it a talking-to from the developer.
